text: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
author: Buddha

text: I am not only a pacifist but a militant pacifist. I am willing to fight for peace. Nothing will end war unless the people themselves refuse to go to war.
author: Albert Einstein

text: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: C. S. Lewis

text: The greatest destroyer of peace is abortion because if a mother can kill her own child, what is left for me to kill you and you to kill me? There is nothing between.
author: Mother Teresa

text: The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
